settings.quest-text: Are there any additional fees besides the monthly subscription cost?
settings.ans-text: While Shopify's monthly subscription plans cover most of the essential features and functionalities, there may be additional fees for certain add-ons, transaction fees on sales made through third-party payment gateways (if not using Shopify Payments), and shipping fees. It's important to review the pricing details and any additional costs associated with the specific features or services you require for your store.

settings.quest-text: Does Shopify provide customer support for store owners?
settings.ans-text: Yes, Shopify offers 24/7 customer support via live chat, email, and phone. Whether you have questions about setting up your store, managing orders, or troubleshooting technical issues, Shopify's support team is available to assist you at any time
